name: Charred Page of 'De Vermis Mysteriis' [Erweiterung]
physical_description: A single, blackened piece of vellum that feels unnaturally cold. The Latin text is illuminated with strange, non-Euclidean geometry.
history: Discovered in the ashes of the Miskatonic University library fire of 1882. Kept in the restricted collection ever since.
content_summary: Details a spell, 'The Voorish Sign', which allows the caster to briefly see the unseen and pass through magical barriers. The components required are unsettling.
